ygData.subject: Re: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, finally something interesting happened on sleepy Drinal last night. I had this urge to visit Lesser Faydark, so I zoned in . . . and found the body of an
ygData.messageBody:
Well, finally something interesting happened on
sleepy Drinal last night. I had this urge to visit
Lesser Faydark, so I zoned in . . . and found the body
of an Undead Sprite Horror. Asked the people
standing around if it was theirs -- yup, and they're
nasty. About 10 seconds later, another Undead Sprite
Horror shows up, and a Brownie as well. By the time I
collected my wits, it was LOADING, PLEASE WAIT . .
.<br><br>When I got back to the zone entrance, someone else
(also waiting to do a corpse recovery) suggested it was
a GM event. I though it might have to do with the
coming war . . . The sky was red, and as I walked
through LFaydark, I saw MANY Undead Sprites, Sprite
Spooks, and Sprite Horrors. I love Sneak/Hide with
SoW.<br><br>Didn't find anything interesting, however, and the sky
cleared up at about 1:00 a.m. Pacific time or
thereabouts. Anyone have any idea what was going on? Is this
related to the war, or something else? <br><br>On another
note, will a 12th level character be able to do
anything other than hide in this war?!<br><br>Kharlisht of
Kaladim<br>12th season rogue<br>Sleepy Drinal
